titleStmt.title: The foolish abuse and wise use of riches a sermon preached in the parish-church of Bromsgrove in Worchester-shire, May 1, 1695, upon occasion of a charity given to that place by Sir Thomas Cookes of Bentley, Kt. Bar. / by W. Talbot ...
titleStmt.author: Talbot, William, 1658 or 9-1730.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
